com.taobao.datax.common.plugin
接口 Line

所有已知实现类：
DefaultLine
public interface Line

Represents one record of data which may be in database, HDFS, etc. Reader and Writer exchange data with each other in the way of Line (Usually exchange multiple lines every time).

方法摘要
 boolean addField(java.lang.String field)
          Add a field into the Line.
 boolean addField(java.lang.String field, int index)
          Add a field into the Line.
 Line fromString(java.lang.String lineStr, char separator)
          Use param(separator) as separator of field, split param(linestr) and construct a Line.
 java.lang.String getField(int idx)
          Get one field of the Line indexed by the param.
 int getFieldNum()
          Get number of total fields in the Line.
 int length()
          Get length of all fields, exclude separate.
 java.lang.String toString(char separator)
          Use param as separator of field, translate the Line into String.
 java.lang.StringBuffer toStringBuffer(char separator)
          Use param as separator of field, format the Line into StringBuffer.
 

方法详细信息

addField

boolean addField(java.lang.String field)
Add a field into the Line.

参数：
field - Field added into Line.
返回：
true for OK, false for failure.

addField

boolean addField(java.lang.String field,
                 int index)
Add a field into the Line.

参数：
field - field added into Line.
index - given position of field in the Line.
返回：
true for OK, false for failure.

getField

java.lang.String getField(int idx)
Get one field of the Line indexed by the param.

参数：
idx - given position of the Line.
返回：
field indexed by the param.

getFieldNum

int getFieldNum()
Get number of total fields in the Line.

返回：
number of total fields in Line.

toStringBuffer

java.lang.StringBuffer toStringBuffer(char separator)
Use param as separator of field, format the Line into StringBuffer.

参数：
separator - field separator.
返回：
Line in StringBuffer style.

toString

java.lang.String toString(char separator)
Use param as separator of field, translate the Line into String.

参数：
separator - field separator.
返回：
Line in String.

fromString

Line fromString(java.lang.String lineStr,
                char separator)
Use param(separator) as separator of field, split param(linestr) and construct a Line.

参数：
lineStr - String will be translated into Line.
separator - field separate.
返回：
Line

length

int length()
Get length of all fields, exclude separate.

返回：
length of all fields.
